nodes.html: ALEA offers access to three key journals for ALEA members, which are published 3 times per year.

Element has sufficient color contrast of 21

nodes.html: • Practical Literacy: the Early and Primary Years (PLEPY)

any.message: Element has sufficient color contrast of 21

nodes.html: Basic membership includes Practical Literacy: the Early and Primary Years and the choice of 1 other journal, while Comprehensive membership includes all three journals.

any.message: Element has sufficient color contrast of 21

nodes.html: Members can access previous journal editions in the Member Area.

any.message: Element has sufficient color contrast of 12.41

nodes.html: About Australian Journal of Language and Literacy

any.message: Element has sufficient color contrast of 21
Element has sufficient color contrast of 21
Element has sufficient color contrast of 21

nodes.html: The Australian Journal of Language and Literacy aims to:

any.message: Element has sufficient color contrast of 21

nodes.html: • Keep readers informed about current national and international literacy research;

any.message: Element has sufficient color contrast of 21

nodes.html: • Enhance understanding of language and literacy issues in relation to their wider educational and social contexts;

any.message: Element has sufficient color contrast of 21

nodes.html: • Provide a forum in which literacy professionals from all settings can exchange and discuss ideas and practices relevant to their work;

any.message: Element has sufficient color contrast of 21

nodes.html: • Examine and present research with a view as to how findings might be implemented in teaching and learning contexts;

any.message: Element has sufficient color contrast of 21

nodes.html: • Present in-depth investigations of literacy practices and theories.

any.message: Element has sufficient color contrast of 21
Element has sufficient color contrast of 21

nodes.html: Literacy Learning: the Middle Years (LLMY) focuses on the learning and teaching of literacies in School Years 5 to 9. It is produced three times per year and it:

any.message: Element has sufficient color contrast of 21

nodes.html: • documents and disseminates effective and innovative literacy teaching approaches for students in the middle years of schooling, as well as recent research findings;

any.message: Element has sufficient color contrast of 21

nodes.html: • publishes medium length articles in accessible formats, with illustrative material;

any.message: Element has sufficient color contrast of 21

nodes.html: • caters for an audience of teachers, pre-service teachers, teacher educators and others interested in the teaching and learning of literacies in the middle years of schooling.

any.message: Element has sufficient color contrast of 21

nodes.html: About Practical Literacy: the Early and Primary Years

any.message: Element has sufficient color contrast of 21

nodes.html: PLEPY is designed to inspire and assist early years and primary school classroom teachers to enhance their literacy teaching. We always welcome practice-oriented contributions of between 500 and 1500 words that address the journals broad aim or the issues theme specifically.

any.message: Element has sufficient color contrast of 16.25

nodes.html: Literacy Learning: the Middle Years (LLMY) focuses on the learning and teaching of literacies in School Years 5 to 9. It is produced three times per year and it:

nodes.html: PLEPY is designed to inspire and assist early years and primary school classroom teachers to enhance their literacy teaching. We always welcome practice-oriented contributions of between 500 and 1500 words that address the journals broad aim or the issues theme specifically.
